name: CenterPointEnergy
0:
”Alexa, ask CenterPoint Energy for electric contact information”
”Alexa, ask CenterPoint Energy for natural gas contact information”
”Alexa, ask CenterPoint Energy for electric safety tips”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: centerpoint energy
des:
CenterPoint Energy skill provides location based contact information or safety tips to our electric and natural gas customers.

To launch the skill, say, "Alexa, Open CenterPoint Energy" and Alexa will drive you through your request. If you would like to ask for electric contact information, You can say, "Alexa, ask CenterPoint Energy for electric contact information". If you would like to ask for natural gas contact information, You can say, "Alexa, ask CenterPoint Energy for natural gas contact information".
